scripts.deploy-sepolia: graph codegen && graph build --network sepolia && graph deploy --studio p2p-leverage-operations
scripts.deploy-mumbai: graph codegen && graph build --network mumbai && graph deploy --studio mumbai-p2p-leverage
scripts.deploy-arbitrum-goerli: graph codegen && graph build --network arbitrum-goerli && graph deploy --studio hyperbolic-finance
scripts.deploy-arbitrum-goerli-dev: graph codegen && graph build --network arbitrum-goerli --network-file 'dev_networks.json' && graph deploy --studio hyperbolic-finance-dev
